content: if you can crochet a rectangle you can make this easy crochet top pattern with very simple stitches and minimal counting this lightweight top is a perfect mindless make to work on poolside pair it with a maxi skirt or jeans for a polished-looking outfit that ll take you from beach to bbq skills required include half_double_crochet double_crochet and basic seaming pattern is written in nine sizes xs-5x with notes on easy customizations for your body paid pdf option includes very helpful stitch chart that s perfect for visual learners see all our free crochet patterns here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/tag/free-crochet-pattern/
